pages.text: $(#630000)A devastating trap created by the parasites to instantly kill any unsuspecting reader. It, of course, backfired spectacularly and transforms them into a Vagrant instead, after enough bickering.
$(#630000)Most of them will recede back underground past a certain Evolution Phase.
$(#630000)If that ever becomes an issue, giving a Factory a Book will produce a Faustian Note, which does not have the Phase restriction. It's also instantaneous.
